Here’s an outline written in pseudocode / simple shell that you can adapt to a CI step or local cron job:

```bash
#!/usr/bin/env bash
# review-check.sh – flag peer-support guides needing updates

THRESHOLD_DAYS=180      # six months review window
TODAY=$(date +%s)

for f in docs/*.html docs/*.md; do
  LAST=$(grep -i "^  Last Updated:" "$f" | head -1 | awk '{print $3}')
  if [ -n "$LAST" ]; then
    FILEDATE=$(date -d "$LAST" +%s 2>/dev/null)
    AGE=$(( (TODAY - FILEDATE) / 86400 ))
    if (( AGE > THRESHOLD_DAYS )); then

    fi
  fi
done
```
